org.ajgl.primary

Class Drawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ajgl.primary.Drawable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConvexPolygon, Polygon
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AABB, GameObject

    public abstract class Drawable
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConvexPolygon
    This class is designed to be extended by objects that are convex polygons and need to be drawn to the screen.
    Author:
    Tyler Bucher

      Drawable(float[] vertices, int GL_SHAPE_TYPE)
      Creates a Drawable object that is white by default.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Drawable

        public Drawable(float[] vertices,
                float[] colorData,
                float[] textureData,
                int GL_SHAPE_TYPE,
                org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture texture)
        Creates a Drawable object that has color and texture.
        Parameters:
        vertices - - Vertices of the convex shape
        colorData - - RGB or RGBA color data
        textureData - - Localized texture vertices
        GL_SHAPE_TYPE - - The shape type of which will be rendered by OpenGL
        texture - - The texture of the Drawable object

      • Drawable
